item.title: List of very handy uvx use-cases
item.description: Open Marimo uvx marimo edit --sandbox Also uvx marimo tutorial intro iPython with packages uvx --with pandas,yfinance ipython Convert files to markdown uvx markitdown ssrn-4990063.pdf Aider.chat uvx aider Clean up .pyc files and pycache directories uvx pyclean . Collected from this Reddit thread
